testimonials.testimonial: "Because of a generous donor, my child has a bed of their own to sleep in!"
"Thank you to the Pregnancy Centre for the donation of a dining room table to eat at. For the first time the kids and I can sit together and have a family meal!"
"I am so grateful for the stroller that was given to me from a Pregnancy Centre donor! Now getting around the city on the bus with the baby and groceries is so much easier."
"I worried less in my pregnancy about how I would afford important items like a crib or stroller for my baby because the Pregnancy Centre said they have donations to help me."

statistics.stat: regular donors in the past year

banner.header: Help women and families in Kitchener-Waterloo thrive with your donation today
banner.description: Scroll to see our clients' current needs and arrange a donation

testimonials.testimonial: "Dilya visited the Centre and let her support worker know that she did not have anything for her baby to sleep in. Fortunately, an amazing bassinette had been donated to the Centre and was available for Dilya! She was completely overwhelmed and so grateful for this donor!"

"Ellie shared — The Pregnancy Centre is like my family. When I need items like diapers, or baby items I know I can rely on using the Care Closet every week. It is always stocked with amazing items through donations and often I find exactly what I need and it makes life easier. It’s also more than just getting the items I need, it’s the care I receive when I go. Thank you!"

"I called the Centre saying I was in a desperate situation with needing a new bed. Within a few days the Centre had found a donor who not only donated a nearly new bed to me but was able to deliver. You have no idea how much this helped me and showed me that I matter."
